title: Clytie - lingering attention to her father's face

content.prompt: In the beginning of the sixth paragraph to the end of the seventh paragraph ("Without . . . mouth") the description of Clytie’s lingering attention to her father’s face suggests her

choices.label: remorse about her past lack of concern for him
disgust at his gaunt and deathly appearance
repressed antagonism for the years he neglected her

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
